data.name: RPG Maker MV - Creepy Land Tileset Pack
data.detailed_description:
This software is a collection of tilesets that can create a slightly cute demon world where demons live their days at ease, indoors and outdoors.
Some of the tilesets also include character chip versions with movement.

*******************************************
■Contents
●Tilesets：18 sheets (including color difference)
　　Inside_A1/Inside_A2/Inside_A4/Inside_A5/Inside_B
　　Outside_A1/Outside_A2/Outside_A3/Outside_A4/Outside_A5/Outside_B
●Characters：22 sheets (including color difference)
●Window：2 materials
*******************************************
